content: the game a star trek the next generation inspired wesley crusher crochet sweater pattern a note on hobbii com if us crochet terminology you haven t ordered from them yet i highly skill level recommend i know it s intermediate to advanced only basic s9tches are used but the delta shape is hard to order yarn without complicated diagrams are provided being able to feel and touch it but they do an amazing finished size job in their descrip9ons and one adjustable size using different hooks the quality is just wonderful for the price materials this pabern is wriben for hobbii amigo 3 weight acrylic yarn caron has a good selec9on of star trek colors and is found in all us cral stores but i find it pills more easily and is more expensive than amigo hobbii amigo s/m l/xl gray melange 1 2 lt gray melange 3 3 dark red 1 each 1 each teal petroleum green gold curry hook size s/m 4 5mm as pictured l/xl 6 0mm gauge using 4 5mm 19 single_crochet 22 row = 4 using 6 0mm 15 single_crochet 18 row = 4 stitches and abbreviations chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet csdc chainless double_crochet repeat repeat double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet s single_crochet s decrease double_crochet two together skip skip dc3tog double_crochet three together slip_stitch slip s9tch dc5tog double_crochet five together space s space s double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet decrease a double_crochet three st s s9tch s together with the center s9tch a treble_crochet instead tch turning chain of a double_crochet treble_crochet triple crochet fsc founda9on single_crochet the game sweater pa-ern by denise ogier please do not reproduce 1 instructions neck fsc 72 for s/m using 4 5mm ~28 stretched for l/xl use 6 0mm ~33 stretched join into a circle making sure you don t twist it round 1 *chain 3 skip 2 fsc single_crochet in fsc* around end with chain 1 skip 2 fsc double_crochet in 1st chain of beg chain space turn 24 pabern loops round 2 single_crochet in chain space *chain 3 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain space* around un9l you reach the chain space with your beginning single_crochet end with chain 1 double_crochet in beg single_crochet turn 24 loops rounds 3-25 repeat round 2 add or delete rounds for longer or shorter turtleneck collar 24 loops shoulders round 26 single_crochet in chain space *chain 3 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain space* 12 9mes to opposite side chain 3 single_crochet in same chain space for corner mark with s9tch marker and move up as you go repeat from * to * to end placing last single_crochet in the same chain space as your beginning single_crochet end with chain 1 double_crochet in beg single_crochet turn mark that previous chain 1/double_crochet sec9on as the second corner round 27 single_crochet in chain space *chain 3 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain space* to corner chain 3 single_crochet in same chain space for corner repeat from * to * around to beginning corner single_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in beginning
